ModMetaData.name: Color Generator: Options Interpolated
ModMetaData.author: DogLuggage
ModMetaData.description:
Adds color generator "CGOI.ColorGenerator_OptionsInterpolated". Similar to the vanilla "ColorGenerator_Options", but able to generate colors linearly interpolated between pairs of colors.
Github: https://github.com/AnonUserGuy/ColorGenerator_OptionsInterpolated
